comments:
Description:
Ctrl+z to remove the crosstab binding will lead the error[1102]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070601-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a crosstab
2, Remove a binding of crosstab
3, Using Ctrl+z to undo this operation

Expected result:
Undo successfully without exceptions

Actual result:
EmptyStackException occurs

Error log:
java.util.EmptyStackException
	at java.util.Stack.peek(Unknown Source)
	at java.util.Stack.pop(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.activity.ActivityStack.undo(ActivityStack.java:394)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.actions.GlobalUndoAction.run(GlobalUndoAction.java:34)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.Action.runWithEvent(Action.java:498)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.RetargetAction.runWithEvent(RetargetAction.java:229)
	at org.eclipse.jface.commands.ActionHandler.execute(ActionHandler.java:119)
	at org.eclipse.core.commands.Command.executeWithChecks(Command.java:475)
	at org.eclipse.core.commands.ParameterizedCommand.executeWithChecks(ParameterizedCommand.java:429)
It is OK in the v20070601-1347 build and development environment.
